name: Simple Sandwich (Demo)
description:
Simple Sandwich is the ingredient collecting, competitive sandwich making game that the Fellow Humans Development Team has been working on since February.

This is the ALPHA DEMO for Simple Sandwich (there may be some bugs in this sandwich), which is Kickstarting SOON here: Kickstarter Link

Feel free to stream and record the game! Posting on social media is also greatly appreciated! Use @ASandwichGame so we can see your posts on twitter!

Please support the official release on Kickstarter! Help us make this silly game! Try this goofy little slice of what's to come. Jump on innocent ingredients, explore with tons of recipes, create some nasty combinations , and compete with your friends against the clock!

What's currently included:

  • Short gameplay tutorial with both controller and keyboard support!
  • Compete against yourself to gain the highest score!
  • Discover and earn over 50 different recipe combinations!
  • Infinite procedurally generated soundtrack during game play!

The final game will have a lot more of everything. Go check out the Kickstarter for details about what to expect.  Click To View Kickstarter!

Donations are super appreciated! Donations directly help us make this game possible. Anything helps! We're a new startup studio trying our best. Thanks!
